byStatus.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'relation'
    [a, b] = doc._id.split ':'
    switch doc.status
      when 'friends'
        emit [a,'friends'], b
        emit [b,'friends'], a
      when 'a-requested'
        emit [a,'userRequested'], b
        emit [b,'otherRequested'], a
      when 'b-requested'
        emit [b,'userRequested'], a
        emit [a,'otherRequested'], b
